document_data.mainbody:
ndwe Cururen was a half-elf agent of the Lords Alliance in the 15 century DR.
Andwe was known to journey throughout northwest Faer√ªn on behalf of the Lords Alliance. In her travels, she would find out about adventurers who were suitable to be in the service to her superiors. Cururen also sought out information on existing Alliance locations and members.
Cururen was born in Silverymoon and became a Knight in Silver. As of the 15 century DR, she was an emissary and, when times called for it, a diligent agent for the Lords Alliance.
